short_summary: Goal of the project is to construct a temporary site office complex. Approximate dimensions of 246’ x 60’ and approximately 20 pre-manufactured trailers. Work shall also include site grading, house to be completely constructed of steel/ and interior
full_summary:
================ التحديث هنا

### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title and Invitation

**English:** *Greater Toronto Area Contractor Village - Phase 1 Re-tender*
**Français:** *Village des entrepreneurs dans la Région du Grand Toronto- Phase 1 Lancement d'un nouvel appel d'offres*

#### Tender Information
*   **Reference Number**: WS4334218628-Doc4502321438
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: March 22, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 25, 2024 at 14:00 EDT
*   **Project Status**: Expired

#### Procurement Details
*   **Invitation Type**: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreement**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and many others*
*   **Region of Opportunity**: Toronto and surrounding areas

#### Contract Details
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity Address**: Same as Contracting Entity Address
*   **Contract Start Date**: Not specified
*   **Contract End Date**: December 31, 2030

#### Tender Description
The successful Bidder will be responsible for constructing a temporary site office complex made up of approximately twenty pre-manufactured trailers, site grading, storm water management, construction of an access road and parking areas, potable water supply by on-site water and waste holding tanks, electrical power to the site office complex, exterior lighting and security fences. The site office complex will be fitted up with interior partitions, finishes, washrooms and kitchens, HVAC, power, lighting, and IT infrastructure.

#### Important Dates and Times
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 25, 2024 at 14:00 EDT

#### Contact Information
*   **Name**: Ambreen Dhillon (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone
